==Japanese==

===Etymology===
{{IPAchar|/kwasai/}} → {{IPAchar|/kasai/}}

From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=かさい}} compound {{m|ltc|火災|tr=xwa<sup>X</sup> tsoj}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''huǒzāi''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|かさい|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かさい|hhira=くわさい}}

# [[fire]], [[conflagration]] (as in a [[disaster]])
# {{lb|ja|sort=かさい|Buddhism}} one of the three major [[calamity|calamities]] that destroy the world

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|火災救助袋|かさい きゅうじょ-ぶくろ}}: a cloth [[escape]] [[chute]] installed in tall buildings in Japan to [[facilitate]] escape from a fire
* {{ja-r|火災警報|かさい けいほう}}: a [[fire alarm]] {{qualifier|a sound, not a device}}
* {{ja-r|火災避難訓練|かさい ひなん くんれん}}: a [[fire drill]]
* {{ja-r|火災避難路|かさい ひなんろ}}: a [[fire escape]], a fire escape [[route]]
* {{ja-r|火災保険|かさい ほけん}}: [[fire]] [[insurance]]
* {{ja-r|火災報知機|かさい ほうちき}}: a [[fire alarm]] {{qualifier|a device, not a sound}}
* {{ja-r|火災予防条例|かさい よぼう じょうれい}}: a [[fire]] [[prevention]] [[law]] or [[ordinance]], a [[fire code]]
